text: Modern applications need to be extremely fast.

An in-memory cache is a 
common architectural choice

that improves application performance 
and optimizes database costs.
However, configuring a cache can be challenging.

You can face trade-offs between performance and 
cost, often over-provisioning for peak traffic

or continuously adjusting for 
changing traffic patterns.

Amazon ElastiCache is an in-memory 
data store for real-time performance.

It is fully managed and compatible 
with Redis and Memcached.

Amazon ElastiCache Serverless 
is a new serverless option

that dramatically simplifies operating a 
highly available, highly scalable cache.

Setting up a cache, whether for performance 
improvement, session storage, gaming leaderboards,

or generative AI model feature 
stores, has never been easier.

You simply provide a name for your 
cache, and it's ready in under a minute.

You get a simple endpoint that is 
accessible from within your VPC.

ElastiCache Serverless handles the 
complexities of cache operation and scaling,

allowing you to concentrate 
on building your applications.

It continuously monitors memory, 
compute, and network resources

and instantly scales to meet 
application traffic demands
without downtime or performance degradation.
Plus, it comes with pay-per-use pricing.

You pay for stored data and 
compute used by cache requests.
Learn more about Amazon ElastiCache Serverless

and start optimizing your resources and 
lowering your total cost of ownership today.
